data.description:
🔉Today's, the amount of existing digital 
     data obtained from various resources is 
     growing in a tremendous rate. The big 
     data science field aims to deal with a 
     huge amount of data that is most often    
     impossible to store in the memory of a 
     single computer, and this would be from 
     various perspectives including: big data 
     cleaning, preparation, and analysis as 
     well as extracting insights and 
     information from large structured and 
     unstructured data sets. 

الان في ظل زيادة كمية البيانات الرقمية الموجودة و التي يتم الحصول عليها من مختلف الموارد بمعدلات هائله. تهدف علوم البيانات الكبيرة الي التعامل مع الكميات الضخمة من البيانات التي من المستحيل في أغلب الأحيان تخزينها في ذاكرة جهاز كمبيوتر واحد، و يتم ذلك من منظورات مختلفة بما في ذلك: تنقيه البيانات الكبيرة، وإعدادها ، وتحليلها، وكذلك استخراج التصورات والمعلومات من مجموعات  البيانات المنظمة وغير المنظمة. 

💪Due to the importance of such field and 
     its various applications in industry, 
🏢National Telecommunication Institute-
     NTI is organizing a workshop on "Big 
     data science" gathers the big data 
     specialists and data scientists in Egypt 
     from multinational companies, academia 
     and private sector to share their 
     knowledge and expertise across multiple 
     industries. 

و نظرا لأهمية هذا المجال وتطبيقاته المختلفة في الصناعة، يقوم المعهد القومي للاتصالات السلكية واللاسلكية بتنظيم ورشة عمل بشأن 'علوم البيانات الكبيرة' بالتعاون مع الشركات المتعددة الجنسيات والخبراء من الأوساط الأكاديمية والقطاع الخاص من اجل تبادل المعرفه والخبره عبر الصناعات المتعددة.

🎯The objective of the workshop is to  
      provide a general overview of big data 
      science, its main concepts and 
      perspectives with an eye on some of its 
      industrial applications, in addition to a 
      big data science tutorial.

وسوف تقدم ورشة العمل لمحة عامة عن علوم البيانات الكبيرة، ومفاهيمها الرئيسية ووجهات النظر الخاصه بها، مع بعض من تطبيقاتها الصناعية، بالإضافة إلى برنامج تعليمي تطبيقي عن علوم البيانات الكبيره.

👉The Targeted Audience‭:‬
      -Engineers who work in the field of  ICT,  
         particularly in Big data field.‬
       -R &D.
       -Data scientists.
       -Fresh graduates.
       -Senior computer, electronics and  
         communication engineering students.                               

الحضور المستهدفين:
- المهندسين العاملين في المجال.
-المتخصصين في مجال الأبحاث والتطوير.
-العلماء في مجال البيانات.
-حديثي التخرج.
-الطلبه في السنه الاخيره مجالات الحاسب والالكترونيات والاتصالات.

🎤Keynotes Speakers:
     -Prof. Ali Hadi -AUC.
     -Prof. Samhaa El beltagy- Nile 
       University.
     -Assoc. Prof. Motaz El-Saban - Raisa
       Energy Egypt.
     -Dr. Ahmed El-Salab- Valeo.
     -Dr. Sameh Al-Ansary- Novelari.
     -Eng. Hisham Arafat Shehata- New 
       Horizons.
     -Eng. Hossam Abuelwafa - Appspatrols.
     -Eng. Mohamed Elgombolaty- Dell EMC.
     -Eng. Mohammed Ezz- Affectiva.
     -Eng. Sherif Ahmed- AppsPatrols.
     -Eng. Tarek El Dally - Microsoft.

💡For more info. about the biography of 
     the speakers 🗣, click here 👇
http://www.nti.sci.eg/bigdatascience/speakers.html

للمزيد من المعلومات عن السيره الذاتية للمتحدثين، من خلال الدخول علي اللينك 👆.

💪The workshop attendance is a 💷free of 
      charge 😀.

👍At the end of the workshop the accepted

🤓Looking forward to your active

نتطلع الي مشاركتكم الفعاله والمثمرة🤓.

👁P.S.: For the tutorial day, please bring 
             your laptops for practice on big

data.name: Big Data Science Workshop

data.description:
Please ensure you register ahead of time by visiting: http://uoft.me/HealthIT2

HOSTED BY: Centre for Health Sector Strategy @ Rotman

SPEAKERS: 
- Aaron Berk, Partner, KPMG Digital Health Practice
- Michael Dingle, Partner, Deals, National Deals Technology Leader
- Avi Goldfarb, Ellison Professor of Marketing, Rotman School of Management
- Alison Paprica, VP, Health Strategy and Partnerships, Vector Institute

HOST: Will Falk, Executive in Residence, ThinkResearch

TOPIC: "Big Data and Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare"

TIMING: 4:00 to 4:30pm registration check-in; 4:30 to 6:00pm presentations, discussions and Q&A; 6:00 to 6:30pm reception

VENUE: Fleck Atrium (Ground Floor, North Building)
Rotman School of Management, U of Toronto, 
105 St George Street

COST: $25.00 + HST per person (includes 1 seat at the presentation and light reception) - Register to attend all 4 sessions for $75.00 + HST

SYNOPSIS: A panel of experts will discuss Big Data in Healthcare.

ROTMAN LINK AND LEARN SERIES CERTIFICATE - HEALTH IT MODULE: For those who register to attend all four Health IT Sessions you may be eligible for a certificate of completion.

- November 7, 2017 - Health IT Session 1: Digitizing Health and the Consumer – What does it mean to put patients first?
- December 6, 2017 - Health IT Session 2: Big Data and Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare
- February 13, 2018 - Health IT Session 3: How Ontario`s Digital Entrepreneurs Are Creatively Destroying and Modernizing Healthcare
- March 6, 2018 - Health IT Session 4: Innovating Entrants to Healthcare Delivery: How they are Changing the Way We Think About Delivering Care

For more information on Link and Learn Series Certificates and Modules visit the Centre for Health Sector Strategy Website.

BIOGRAPHIES:

Will Falk, Executive in Residence, ThinkResearch 
Prior to joining Think Research, William was a partner with PwC and led their healthcare team in Canada. William has spent more than 25 years as a strategist and management consultant in New York and Toronto, advising top academic centres, governments, and innovative companies in healthcare. He has academic appointments as an Executive-in-Residence at the University of Toronto’s Rotman School of Management and an Executive Fellow at the Mowat Centre, and is a Senior Fellow at the C.D. Howe Institute.

ABOUT THE CENTRE: Launched in 2004, the Centre for Health Sector Strategy @ Rotman is a strategic area of focused research for the Rotman School. Under the direction of Professor Brian R. Golden and a board of advisors from industry, government and academia, the centre drives a research agenda that produces actionable management knowledge for the health sector and the life sciences.

NEW - Global Executive MBA for Healthcare and the Life Sciences: The pace of change in healthcare and the life sciences sector has been accelerating, creating a demand for professionals who can navigate the strategic, economic, political, and social undercurrents that are changing the face of this global structure. To meet the challenge, the Rotman School of Management is introducing its Global Executive MBA for Healthcare and the Life Sciences. Grounded in world-class thought leadership and practical instruction, this 18-month program will you help develop the expertise you need to drive your career.

FOR MORE INFORMATION AND TO REGISTER VISIT: http://uoft.me/HealthIT2

Join the Meetup by Aegis-IBM, Big Data Day: What it takes to be a Data Scientist? Explore & learn everything you wanted to know about Data Scientist, Data Science, Big Data, Business Analytics, Predictive analytics, ML, NLP, Cognitive Computing. 

How it is used in real life in various functional areas like Finance, Operations, Marketing, HR etc in different industries eCommerce, Telecom, health, banking, insurance, automobile etc Learn how various tools like Spark, Hadoop, R, Python, IBM Watson, SAS and IBM Infoshphre Big Insight can empower you in your data science journey.

Agenda:

?????????
What is Data Science? What is Business Analytics? Whats Big Data? Whats is Predictive Analytics? IBM Watson? How Cognitive Computing, Data Science, Business Analytics and Big Data is changing the world? Who is using?

Jobs, Package and Opportunities in Big Data, Analytics and Data Science?
What are career opportunities? Which companies are hiring? What is salary range in this field? How a fresher BSc Stats guy got 11 lacs starting package in AngelBroking? Why TCS S/W professional got 100% hike in HDFC? Why Paytm hired 8 Data Scientists at package of USD 350,000?

Can I do Career shift at this age?

data.description:
🔖 FREE 
🚀 Doors: 19h30 
💡 Talk: 20h30 sharp 
🍸 + Unique cocktails and live music by Joli cœur

〰 Big Data & Privacy with Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye 〰

Privacy, does it still matter? What can mobile phone data be used for? How do we safely use big data while moving forward?

This last episode of this first season of Science & Cocktails in Brussels is a simultaneously fantastic and terrifying experience that will both raise concerns about your privacy and lead you to understand the human benefits of big data. A talk guided by Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye followed by the upcoming alternative rock band Joli Coeur.

We live in a time when information about most of our movements and actions is collected and stored in real time. Everyone is collecting some type of data from you: your google searches, your online food orders, your holiday locations and the profiles of others you check on Facebook. And the availability of large-scale mobile phone, credit card, browsing history, etc, dramatically increases our capacity to understand and potentially affect the behavior of individuals and collectives.

The use of this data, however, raises legitimate privacy concerns. In this event, Yves-Alexandre de Montjoye will discuss how traditional data protection mechanisms fail to protect people’s privacy in the age of big data. More specifically, he will show how sensitive information can often be inferred from seemingly innocuous data. He will then discuss some of the socially positive uses of big data and solutions that he and his group is developing at Imperial College London to allow large-scale behavioral data to be used while giving individual strong privacy guarantees.

Afterwards, private cocktails that can be collectively shared while Joli Coeur, an alternative pop rock band, takes the stage and will present its Debut album released this Fall.
data.name: Science & Cocktails #3: Big Data & Privacy

data.description:
G.E.C a le plaisir de vous annoncer le lancement de sa prochaine session de Formation : Big Data

Le Big Data s’installe désormais dans le paysage des solutions de traitement des données massives. Il permet effectivement, grâce à la maîtrise des informations et des données, d’optimiser la performance opérationnelle de l’entreprise et ainsi de renforcer ses avantages concurrentiels. Si pour certains d’entre nous, le Big Data reste un concept imprécis, pour d’autres, il ouvre donc déjà la voie à de nombreuses applications. Cette formation pratique apporte un éclairage sur les usages et les technologies associées au Big Data. Il répond aux questions de son exploitation au sein de l’entreprise.

==>Volume horaire : 02 jours (pendant les weekends)
==>Coût : 150DT 
-->La formation est à 80% Pratique.
-->Qualité garantie: Cabinet expérimenté (+10 ans d'expérience), des intervenants et des formateurs experts seniors 
-->Environnement agréable (groupes limités au max à 6 participants)
*****Pour réservation Merci de remplir le formulaire ci-joint :
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfUE9SnPvFDuHbE0SYpi3_gI93BaA2sKz2L2misV1J-CATyfQ/viewform
Pour plus d'informations n'hésitez pas de nous recontacter sur le:
GSM : 52 758 141 Fixe : 36 131 820
Email : gec.direction@gmail.com
Adresse : Immeuble n°35 App 5 ( 3éme étage ) Avenue la Gare - Tunis

data.description:
10 березня, продовжуючи традицію, ми знову будемо проводити конференцію AI&BigData Day в місті Лева. Подія збере близько 350 data scientist, розробників, стартап-підприємців, науковців, дата інженерів, інвесторів та зацікавлених з України, Німеччини, Чехії, Швейцарії, США, Канади та країн східної Європи. Виступить близько 40 досвідчених доповідачів.

Конференція присвячена новітнім розробкам у сфері штучного інтелекту та обробки великих даних. Це професійно дискусійний майданчик, який об’єднує дослідників і практиків, котрі працюють в нових фронтирах розвитку можливостей людства. Майданчик покликаний поєднати науковий підхід, підприємницький хист та інженерні таланти заради розповсюдження новітніх знань.

Потоки конференції: 
* Data Science
Потік створений для всіх хто хоче дізнатися про найновіші ідеї та підходи у галузі Data Science, а також познайомитися зі своїми потенційними менторами та партнерами.
* Startups
Потік для всіх тих, хто буквально з ліхтарем ходить у пошуках відповідей. Розширте свої горизонти і отримаєте нові знання. Останні тренди, доповіді про використання кращих інструментів, інсайти від експертів, унікальні знання з перших вуст.
* Data Engineering
Потік для розробників і науковців, хто створює нові технології і бажає познайомитися з успішними кейсами і реальними прикладами впровадження технологій на основі даних, які вже ефективно працюють на ринку сьогодні.
*Workshops
Потік для глибшого занурення в цікаву тему та отримання практичних знань.

Вартість квитків:
•	«Ранні пташки» перші 30 зареєстрованих учасників - 950 грн.
•	«Ранні» до 15 грудня - 1300 грн.
•	«Стандарт» до 15 лютого - 1600 грн.
•	«Фінальна ціна» - 1900 грн.
•       Студентські квитки  - 700 грн.
У вартість квитка входить: вільне відвідування всіх потоків конференції, обід і каво-перерви на нетворкінгу,  та відеозаписи усіх доповідей після конференції.
Реєструйтесь вже зараз за зниженою ціною -  http://aiconf.com.ua/registration/

Організатор: Lemberg Tech Business School: організація з 9-річною історією проведення успішних конференцій: Lviv Mobile Development Day, GameDev Conference, Lviv PM Day та Lviv Freelance Forum.

Ми відкриті для ваших пропозицій. Якщо Ви можете порекомендувати спікера, будь ласка, зверніться до нас  - nzhyvytska@startup.lviv.ua.

Offre Spéciale début d'année 2018:
Formation Big Data : 50 Heures à partir du 06 Janvier 2018
Prix : 2.000 dhs Etudiants - 3.000 Salariés.Places limitées.
e-mail : atelierbigdata@gmail.com 
GSM :  06-78-23-03-02   
Le formateur qui  assure cette formation dispose de plus de 20 ans d’expérience Nationale et Internationale  et a déjà enseigné le Big- Data et l'Architecture Distribuée durant 06 ans pour les Bachelors Réseaux ainsi que le Master 2 Européen en Informatique.IL est aussi certifié en Hadoop, Spark, Scala, NoSQL et Deep learning.
Les bénéfices de cette formation : 
1- Maîtriser la terminologie de base, les concepts et les utilisations du Big Data .
2- Comprendre comment installer et gérer les clusters Hadoop et Spark.
3- En savoir plus sur l'architecture Hadoop-Spark et comment l'utiliser pour tester des algorithmes d'apprentissage en Machine et Deep Learning.
4- Découvrez comment déterminer si un problème est mieux résolu avec l'approche du Big Data.
5- Explorez le code utilisé pour résoudre les problèmes du Big Data Science dans les situations professionnelles.
data.name: Formation Big Data

data.description:
We are excited to announce one of our biggest seminars of this year!

From SIRI to self-driving cars, artificial intelligence (AI) is progressing rapidly. While science fiction often portrays AI as robots with human-like characteristics, AI can encompass anything from Google’s search algorithms to IBM’s Watson to autonomous machines. Another development that has made great impact is big data. Big data describes a holistic information management strategy that includes and integrates many new types of data and data management.

We are proud to announce that, together with IBM and Microsoft we are organizing a seminar about artificial intelligence and big data! Jesse van Leth, an AI specialist from Microsoft is going to talk about what AI exactly is and how it affects our society and lives. Furthermore, Mando Rotman, a senior manager consultant cognitive & analytics at IBM, and Madli Uutma, a data scientist consultant at IBM are going to cover multiple topics related to big data. 

So are you curious about our future and how technology will shape it? And are you looking for an opportunity to learn more about AI and Big data from managers who work within these fields for leading companies? Then sign up for this event!

*This event is FREE, sign up before the attendance capacity is full!*
data.name: TuringX- AI and Big Data with Microsoft and IBM

data.description:
Tham gia chủ đề BẮT ĐẦU VỚI BIG DATA TỪ ĐÂU VÀ NHƯ THẾ NÀO? tại Vietnam Web Summit 2017

Đối với các lập trình viên, Big Data thường gắn liền với Apache Hadoop - công nghệ dựa trên GFS (Google File System) và MapReduce của Google. Tháng 4/2008, Hadoop trở thành hệ thống nhanh nhất để sắp xếp (sort) 1 terabyte dữ liệu, khi mất 209 giây chạy trên cluster gồm 910 nodes. Tháng 11/2008, Google thông báo hệ thống MapReduce chỉ cần 68 giây để sắp xếp 1 terabyte dữ liệu. Đến tháng 5/2009, Yahoo sử dụng Hadoop chỉ cần 62 giây để làm việc tương tự. Từ đó đến nay, Hadoop dần trở thành nòng cốt để giải quyết những bài toán về dữ liệu lớn.

Tuy nhiên, vào năm 2015, Apache Spark (gọi tắt Spark) nổi lên là 1 trong những dự án mã nguồn mở sôi động nhất trong lĩnh vực Big Data, thường xuyên được cập nhật bởi hơn 800 lập trình viên từ 200 công ty trên khắp thế giới, được cho rằng sẽ là sự thay thế Apache Hadoop trong tương lai. Chính cha đẻ của Spark cũng xác định Spark vừa hữu ích cho học máy lẫn xử lý luồng dữ liệu hoàn chỉnh. Đặc biệt, các dev có thể viết ứng dụng Spark bằng nhiều ngôn ngữ khác nhau, từ Scala, Java, Python, đến R. Nhờ những ưu điểm đó mà có rất nhiều hãng lớn đã dùng Spark cho các sản phẩm của mình như Yahoo, ebay, IBM, Cisco, Tencent, Alibaba… với cả petabyte dữ liệu.
Vậy, Hadoop và Spark, đâu mới là lựa chọn thích hợp để phát triển các dự án Big Data? Sau thời gian phát triển lâu dài, thể hiện tính hữu ích trong nhiều sản phẩm, liệu hệ sinh thái Hadoop có thể bị thay thế hoàn toàn bởi Spark? Cùng đến với topic Bắt đầu với Big Data từ đâu và như thế nào? do diễn giả Ông Xuân Hồng (Ong Xuan Hong) - Research Enginner của Trusting Social tại Vietnam Web Summit 2017 để cập nhật những kinh nghiệm làm việc với Big Data thiết thực nhất. 
Chỉ cần đăng kí tại: https://meetup.vn/detail/Vietnam-Web-Summit-2017-191 bạn sẽ tiếp cận được gần 100 topics đặc sắc khác tại Vietnam Web Summit năm nay và nhận được toàn bộ slide của các diễn giả sau sự kiện. Tại sao bạn còn chần chừ?
=======================
☀️ Thời gian & địa điểm:

- 08/12/2017 tại Trung tâm Hội nghị Forevermark, 614 Lạc Long Quân, Q. Tây Hồ, Hà Nội

- Event team: event@applancer.net | 028 6273 3497

data.description:
L’objectif de cette conférence est de comprendre ce que sont les algorithmes et de saisir comment ils s’intègrent à nos usages numériques quotidien. Seront ensuite abordés les principaux enjeux citoyens qui en découlent, notamment pour les pratiques d’informations et d’expression, mais également pour la vie politique et culturelle.

Intervenante : Mélanie Millette, Professeure au Département de communication sociale et publique – Université du Québec à Montréal

Suivi d’un table ronde sur la question suivante : « Quelle éducation aux médias face aux algorithmes » avec

> Patrick Verniers, Président du Master en éducation aux Médias et président du Conseil Supérieur de l'éducation aux médias - CSEM
> Thibault Philippette, Professeur en littératie médiatique (Université catholique de Louvain)
> Jean-Luc Manise, Directeur des services Culture et Education permanente au Centre socialiste d’éducation permanente
> Pierre Hemptinne, Directeur de la Médiation culturelle à PointCulture

--------------------------------------
Entrée gratuite et inscription obligatoire > événement complet
A PointCulture - Bruxelles

Cette formation s’inscrit dans le cadre du programme de formation MediaCoach.

Avec le soutien du service Education permanente de la Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles/Officiel, de la Fondation Evens Guercy, du projet « Belgian Better Internet 2 » (B-Bico) co-financé par l’Union Européenne dans le cadre du programme Connectig Europe Facility. Les contenus de cette publication sont sous la seule responsabilité de Média Animation ASBL, et ne peuvent être considérés comme un reflet de l’opinion officielle de la Commission Européenne.
data.name: Complet - Le citoyen face aux algorithmes et Big Data

data.description:
Vianočný Borell s kapustnicou od Instarea a Market Locator

Priblížili sa nám vianoce a tak opäť pozývame na tradičné ale neformálne koncoročné stretnutie klientov, partnerov, priateľov a fanúšikov rodiny Instarea / Market Locator na našom vianočnom Borelle.

Budeme radi, ak si poznačíte do svojich kalendárov miesto a dátum: 19. december 2017 od 11.30 hod. (neskorší príchod aj odchod voľný) sa stretneme u nás na terase a v priestoroch office v štýle vianočných trhov. Klasicky kapustnica varená v kotlíku na piecke, niečo aj pre vegetariánov, koledy, varené vínko +  "živá" novinka tento rok ;)

V nasledujúcich týždňoch obdržíte RSVP pozvánku  s upresňujúcimi informáciami.
data.name: Xmass Borell#3 Instarea + Market Locator
